docs.text: Welcome to Hari's Docs Hybrid Authorization Managing centralized access control decisions across different systems and applications. Benefits for Security: Centralized Policy Authoring and managing: Hybrid authorization allows defining and enforcing access control policies from a central location. Fine Grained Access Control: Granular control over user permissions becomes possible. One can define access based on user roles, attributes, and specific resource types, enhancing security and minimizing data exposure.
